title: get today's covid19 data
text: can get get_data() function get today’s covid19 data ’s 2 option data country: country data consist country’s covid19 stat continent: can see covid19 data continent want extract data use language Tools, can export 5 format Tools .csv file .xlsx file(Excel) .sav file(SPSS) .xpt file(SAS) .dta file(Stata)
code: data <- get_data("country") get_data_csv("country") get_data_excel("continent") get_data_spss("country") get_data_sas("continent") get_data_stata("country")

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jaeseong Choe. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Choe J (2023). covid19today: get today's world covid19 data. R package version 1.1.0.9000, https://sorrychoe.github.io/covid19today/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {covid19today: get today's world covid19 data},   author = {Jaeseong Choe},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 1.1.0.9000},   url = {https://sorrychoe.github.io/covid19today/}, }

title: get today's world covid19 data
text: covid19today library extracts today’s covid-19 data world.

title: get today's world covid19 data
text: package can installed devtools package

title: get today's world covid19 data
text: can use get_data() function gather today’s world covid19 data
code: data <- get_data(country)  # country: covid-19 data by country # continent: covid-19 data by continent

title: get_data() — get_data
text: scraping information today's covid19 seperate continent, country total data

title: get_data() — get_data
text: option character. country continent

title: get_data() — get_data
code: data <- get_data("country") head(data) #>   Country     Continent TotalCases NewCases TotalDeaths NewDeaths #> 1   World           All  690149669     1393     6890211         5 #> 2     USA North America  107186441       NA     1166663        NA #> 3   India          Asia   44992788       NA      531891        NA #> 4  France        Europe   40112303       NA      167480        NA #> 5 Germany        Europe   38428685       NA      174352        NA #> 6  Brazil South America   37625916       NA      703291        NA #>   TotalRecovered NewRecovered ActiveCases Critical TotalCasesPer1M #> 1      662648340        33087    20611118    37596           88540 #> 2      105316655           NA      703123      848          320146 #> 3       44458447           NA        2450       NA           31986 #> 4       39887383           NA       57440      869          611612 #> 5       38240600           NA       13733       NA          458119 #> 6       36249161           NA      673464       NA          174717 #>   TotalDeathsPer1M TotalTests TotalTestsPer1M Population #> 1            883.9         NA              NA         NA #> 2           3485.0 1180527728         3526013  334805269 #> 3            378.0  930797975          661721 1406631776 #> 4           2554.0  271490188         4139547   65584518 #> 5           2078.0  122332384         1458359   83883596 #> 6           3266.0   63776166          296146  215353593
